attributes.action: Muzzle all dogs in public spaces in UK with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details:
* protect the public
* show the UK is a safe place for tourism
* give time to implement better long term measures, such as licencing for ownership, breeding etc
* use the immediate risk reduction needed for public safety. 
* stop delivery services people being attacked
* protect all humans
* protect all dogs
* give space and time to the experts to work on neutering and breed specific measures
* avoid public legal actions due to the failure of the 1991 act, which has lead to deaths of UK citizens
attributes.background:
Implement this with the speed of covid masks, the public need this now, 1991 banning showed us pitbull numbers increased - the XL is a variety of it. The ban did nothing but make things worse. 
 
Owners, public, farmers, children, need protection. Also to give time for the long term measures.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Make all dogs no matter what breed muzzled in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633198
